problem_names:
lemma wwf_J_mdecl_NonStatic[simp]:
  "wwf_J_mdecl P C (M,NonStatic,Ts,T,pns,body) =
  (length Ts = length pns \<and> distinct pns \<and> \<not>sub_RI body \<and> this \<notin> set pns \<and> fv body \<subseteq> {this} \<union> set pns)"

lemma wwf_J_mdecl_Static[simp]:
  "wwf_J_mdecl P C (M,Static,Ts,T,pns,body) =
  (length Ts = length pns \<and> distinct pns \<and> \<not>sub_RI body \<and> fv body \<subseteq> set pns)"

lemma sees_wwf_nsub_RI:
 "\<lbrakk> wwf_J_prog P; P \<turnstile> C sees M,b : Ts\<rightarrow>T = (pns, body) in D \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not>sub_RI body"
translations:
lemma wwf_J_mdecl_NonStatic[simp]:
  "wwf_J_mdecl P C (M,NonStatic,Ts,T,pns,body) =
  (length Ts = length pns \<and> distinct pns \<and> \<not>sub_RI body \<and> this \<notin> set pns \<and> fv body \<subseteq> {this} \<union> set pns)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wwf_J_mdecl P C (M, NonStatic, Ts, T, pns, body) =
    (length Ts = length pns \<and>
     distinct pns \<and>
     \<not> sub_RI body \<and>
     this \<notin> set pns \<and>
     fv body \<subseteq> {this} \<union> set pns)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wwf_J_mdecl P C (M, NonStatic, Ts, T, pns, body) =
    (length Ts = length pns \<and>
     distinct pns \<and>
     \<not> sub_RI body \<and>
     this \<notin> set pns \<and>
     fv body \<subseteq> {this} \<union> set pns)

lemma wwf_J_mdecl_Static[simp]:
  "wwf_J_mdecl P C (M,Static,Ts,T,pns,body) =
  (length Ts = length pns \<and> distinct pns \<and> \<not>sub_RI body \<and> fv body \<subseteq> set pns)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wwf_J_mdecl P C (M, Static, Ts, T, pns, body) =
    (length Ts = length pns \<and>
     distinct pns \<and>
     \<not> sub_RI body \<and> fv body \<subseteq> set pns)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wwf_J_mdecl P C (M, Static, Ts, T, pns, body) =
    (length Ts = length pns \<and>
     distinct pns \<and>
     \<not> sub_RI body \<and> fv body \<subseteq> set pns)

abbreviation
  wwf_J_prog :: "J_prog \<Rightarrow> bool" where
  "wwf_J_prog \<equiv> wf_prog wwf_J_mdecl"

lemma sees_wwf_nsub_RI:
 "\<lbrakk> wwf_J_prog P; P \<turnstile> C sees M,b : Ts\<rightarrow>T = (pns, body) in D \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not>sub_RI body"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wwf_J_prog P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M, b :  Ts\<rightarrow>T = (pns,
                 body) in D\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> sub_RI body

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P \<turnstile> C sees M, b :  Ts\<rightarrow>T = (pns,
                         body) in D;
     wf_mdecl wwf_J_mdecl P D (M, b, Ts, T, pns, body)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> sub_RI body
